Data Fields
devfifo_info_t Struct Reference
Stratify OS » Device Interface » Device FIFO

#include <devfifo.h>

Detailed Description

This structure defines the attributes used in a device fifo.

Data Fields

uint32_t size
 The total number of bytes in the FIFO.
 
uint32_t used
 The number of bytes ready to be read from the FIFO.
 
uint32_t overflow
 Non-zero if FIFO has dropped data because data is arriving faster than it is being read; this value is cleared when it is read using I_DEVFIFO_GETINFO.
